Room.Name: Overland Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Overland Drive betwen Marina Way and Main Street.
Room.LongDescription: This narrow city street contains a long line of small shops and stores where you can find a number of exotic items. To the west is Main Street, where most of the entrances to the shops are located. East is Marina Way, which which brings you towards the rear of the stores. Oceanview Drive continues to the east and west.
